# Overview

In this tutorial we are going to build a basic website in quarto and host it on github.

You can find indepth information on the [quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/) page.

# Setup

Create a quarto website project in quarto.

New Project\>New Directory\>Quarto Website

Pick a folder where you will keep your website documents. You will now see the following documents in your files space.

![Files](images/1.png)

The files you are seeing are:

A yml file that ["config file that provides website options as well as defaults for HTML documents created within the site"](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/).  For instance, this file when created specifies the default theme for the page that willbe rendered.  The default is cosmo:

"format:
  html:
    theme: cosmo
    css: styles.css
    toc: true"
    
If you don't like cosmo you can pick a different [theme](https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/html-themes.html)
